column1: Flow ID,Name,Description,Test Steps,Flow Priority

1,Verify Successful Sign in and Service Request Submission,"Sign in as an admin, navigate to service requests, fill out the service form, and verify successful submission.","Step 1: Navigate to auth/*
Step 2: Click on button welcomeSignIn
Step 3: Login -> Navigate to page 'admin/*'
Step 4: Click on link serviceRequest
Step 5: Select service and sub-service options in a form
Step 6: Click on button ok -> Navigate to page ''
Step 7: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

,High
2,Verify Contact Form Submission,Sign in as an admin, navigate to contacts, fill out the contact form, and verify successful submission.","Step 1: Navigate to auth/*
Step 2: Click on button welcomeSignIn
Step 3: Login -> Navigate to page 'admin/*'
Step 4: Click on link contacts
Step 5: Enter input value in input email
Step 6: Enter input value in input name
Step 7: Enter input value in input phone
Step 8: Enter input value in input surname
Step 9: Enter input value in textarea message
Step 10: Click on button send
Step 11: Click on span close -> Navigate to page ''
Step 12: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

,High
3,Verify Service and Sub service Form Progression,Sign in as an admin, navigate to service requests, select service and sub-service options, progress through form steps, and verify completion.","Step 1: Navigate to auth/*
Step 2: Click on button welcomeSignIn
Step 3: Login -> Navigate to page 'admin/*'
Step 4: Click on link serviceRequest
Step 5: Click on input selectAserviceProgramId
Step 6: Click on item option1
Step 7: Click on input selectAsubserviceSubProgramId
Step 8: Click on item option1
Step 9: Click on button formNext
Step 10: Click on button formNext2
Step 11: Click on button formNext2 -> Navigate to page ''
Step 12: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

,Medium
4,Verify Leaving Service Request Form,Sign in as an admin, navigate to service requests, start filling the form, then navigate to contacts. Verify leaving the form redirects to the home page.","Step 1: Navigate to auth/*
Step 2: Click on button welcomeSignIn
Step 3: Login -> Navigate to page 'admin/*'
Step 4: Click on link serviceRequest
Step 5: Select service and sub-service options in a form
Step 6: Click on link contacts
Step 7: Click on button leave -> Navigate to page ''
Step 8: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

,Low
5,Verify Service Option Selection and Submission,Sign in as an admin, navigate to service requests, select service options, fill out the form, and verify successful submission.","Step 1: Navigate to auth/*
Step 2: Click on button welcomeSignIn
Step 3: Login -> Navigate to page 'admin/*'
Step 4: Click on link serviceRequest
Step 5: Click on item option1
Step 6: Select service and sub-service options in a form
Step 7: Click on button ok -> Navigate to page ''
Step 8: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

,Low
6,Verify Contact Form Submission from Home Page,Login, navigate to contacts, fill out the contact form, and verify successful submission from the home page.","Step 1: Login
Step 2: Navigate to auth/*
Step 3: Click on link contacts
Step 4: Enter input value in input email
Step 5: Enter input value in input name
Step 6: Enter input value in input phone
Step 7: Enter input value in input surname
Step 8: Enter input value in textarea message
Step 9: Click on button formSend
Step 10: Click on span close -> Navigate to page ''
Step 11: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
,Trivial
